name: Espresso
description: A strong and rich shot of coffee, perfect for a quick energy boost.

name: Cappuccino
description: A perfect balance of espresso, steamed milk, and foam.

name: Latte
description: A creamy and smooth coffee with steamed milk and a light foam topping.

name: Mocha
description: A delightful blend of espresso, chocolate, and steamed milk.

name: Americano
description: Espresso diluted with hot water for a smooth, rich taste.
